<<<<<<< HEAD
A discovery of new worlds from the French, made English by A. Behn. Fontenelle, M. de (Bernard Le Bovier), 1657-1757. Behn, Aphra, 1640-1689.
[44], 158 p.
Printed for William Canning, London : 1688.
"To which is prefixed a preface, by way of essay, on translated prose, wherein the arguments of Father Tacquet, and others, against the system of Copernicus (as to the motion of the earth) are likewise considered and answered. Wholly new." Reproduction of original in the University of Illinois (Urbana-Champaign Campus). Library.
=======
